title: inca dhaya raalEdA
sahitya:
inka daya rAlEdA nApai inta parAmukhamElanayya

anupallavi

pankajAsanad-yamara vandita pankEruhAkSa patita daitya shikSa

caraNam

santatambu nI satkathalanu vini santOSamuga bhajana jEyucu
cinta dIrcci nannu brOtuvani nEnentO pogaDu kaNDaka iTu
panta mEla jesEvu delupumu patita pAvana Ashrta janAvana
danti varada shrI venkatEsha dAnava kula bhIkara shrIkara
